definition: in or to a backstage area of a theater, concealed from public view or attention, a stage area out of sight of the audience
details:
adverb
- in or to a backstage area of a theater
= example: in or to a backstage area of a theater
- out of view of the public
adjective
- concealed from public view or attention
= synonyms: offstage
noun
- a stage area out of sight of the audience
= synonyms: wing
